sourcesContent:
<template>
  
  <v-list
    class="pt-0"
    flat

  >
  <draggable
        v-model="tasks"
        handle=".handle"
      >
    <task 
      v-for="task in tasks"
      :key="task.id"
      :task="task"

    />
  </draggable>
  </v-list>
 
</template>

<script>
import draggable from "vuedraggable";

export default {
  computed:{

    tasks: {
        get() {
            return this.$store.getters.tasksFiltered
        },
        set(value) {
            this.$store.commit('updateTasks', value)
        }
    }
  },

  
  components: {
    'task': require('@/components/Todo/Task.vue').default,
    draggable
  }
}
</script>
